actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-770.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Stafford without amendment. With written report No. 98-446.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 871.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts for FY 1985 and 1986.

titles.title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
